abstract: willa fitzgerald in talks to join ansel elgort in ` the goldfinch '
article: exclusive : willa fitzgerald , who starred on mtv 's scream offshoot , is in talks to co-star opposite ansel elgort and sarah paulson in the john crowley-diretced film adaptation of the goldfinch , based on donna tartt 's pulitzer-winning novel . peter straughan wrote the screenplay , which centers around theodore decker who , after surviving a bombing at the metropolitan museum of art that kills his mother , is taken in by a wealthy upper east side family . fitzgerald is looking to take on the role of kitsey barbour , who is engaged to theo though the two are not completely honest with each other .

nina jacobson and brad simpson of color force productions are producing the pic , with amazon studios co-financing . warner bros will distribute october 11 , 2019 . fitzgerald was recently tapped as the lead of e! 's hourlong dark comedy pilot , #fashionvictim , and will play meg in bbc america 's upcoming limited series little women . she is repped by principato-young entertainment and paradigm .
